attributeCategory.description: General category for the attribute. very similar to Trait class.

attributeDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies this attribute within the given database server

attributeDescription.description: A human readable description of this attribute

attributeName.description: A human readable name for this attribute

attributePUI.description: The Permanent Unique Identifier of an Attribute, usually in the form of a URI

documentationURL.description: A URL to the human readable documentation of this object

growthStage.description: Growth stage at which measurement is made (examples: "flowering")

institution.description: Name of institution submitting the variable

language.description: 2 letter ISO 639-1 code for the language of submission of the variable.

scientist.description: Name of scientist submitting the variable.

submissionTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the Variable was added (ISO 8601)
